attributes.action: employ full-time immigration officers at every ferry port and airport in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Their role would be to fully check the identity of everyone coming into or leaving the UK. They should have the powers to detain those with a false identity and those who are wanted by the police etc. This could be done by a mixture of technology such as ID Cards or by the immigration officers being able to remove veils etc. It wouldn't cost much money and would be an added level of security.
